document_data.name: Rivon Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Rivon Street''' was a hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]] paved street in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This street ran south off of [[Wall Way]] and terminated on [[Vellarr's Lane]]. Along the way, it acted as the western terminus of [[Spendthrift Alley]].

Notable Locations.House of Song: Guildhall of the [[Council of Musicians, Instrument-Makers, & Choristers]].
